name: The Food Pantry
description: Every Saturday, the pantry supplies free groceries to 500 hungry families. The pantry includes fresh fruits and vegetables, rice, beans, pasta, cereal, and bread for neighbors in the 94107 and 94110 zip codes. To get groceries, come to the gate on Mariposa Street from Noon - 1:00PM. For the current pantry schedule, please use the online LINK

howToGetIt: We’re open Saturday 11am – 1pm for the residents of all areas south of Market Street in San Francisco. No registration or identification needed.
address: 500 De Haro Street, San Francisco, CA, 94107
agency: St Gregory Of Nyssa Episcopal Church
